overview: One of our favorite movies - this Jason Adonis flick shows him off with some of the best guys to walk through Jet Set's doors. Mirage is a perfect name for this movie. These guys are so hot looking, you won't believe they're real! You'll tell yourself, "It must be a Mirage, no one is that good looking!" Grab a towel, because you're going to cum and make a BIG mess!
title: Mirage
